title: The Demographic Struggle for Power (1977) by Milica Bookman
description:
The Demographic Struggle for Power - The Political Economy of Demographic Engineering in the Modern World (1977) by Milica Zarkovic Bookman.pdf

The 20th-century demographic struggle for power translates itself into an inter-ethnic war of numbers. This book offers suggestions for structural alterations within states to sever the link between ethnic size and power, and thus eliminate the rationale for the demographic struggle for power.

284 pages
Publisher: Routledge (May 2, 1977)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0714642827
ISBN-13: 978-0714642826
